title: Introducing: Deathcats
content:
While on my daily scour of SoundCloud I stumbled across this little gem which just so happened to come from close to home.

Released over three months ago, Dreamz by Glasgow’s Deathcats is three and a half minutes of deliciously fuzzy and hectic production, with one hell of a catchy hook that’ll leave you humming along for days.

Check out Dreamz below:

[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/131484430″ params=”auto_play=false&hide_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /]
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
